title: The Truth About Going Vegan
description:
Parental guilt can make you overcompensate in ways that aren't best for your kids. Plus, Jillian talks holiday weight gain and vegan diets.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
